{%trans "Getting started"%}

{%trans "Sarshomar's API exposes the entire Sarshomar infrastructure via a standardized programmatic interface. Using Sarshomar's API, you can do just about anything you can do on Sarshomar.com via the customer dashboard."%}

{%trans "The Sarshomar API is a RESTful API based on HTTPS requests and JSON responses. If you are registered with Sarshomar, you can obtain your API key from the bottom of the My Account page, found here: Go to My account."%}

{%trans "Endpoints"%}

{%trans "The API is accessed by making HTTPS requests to a specific version endpoint URL, in which GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE methods dictate how your interact with the information available. Every endpoint is accessed only via the SSL-enabled HTTPS (port 443) protocol."%}

{%trans "Everything (methods, parameters, etc.) is fixed to a version number, and every call must contain one. The latest version is Version 4."%}

{%trans "The stable HTTPS endpoint for the latest version is:"%}

{{url.base}}/api/v1/

{%trans "HTTP response codes"%}

{%trans "The status of a response can be determined from the HTTP status code."%}

{%trans "Code"%}
{%trans "Status"%}
{%trans "Description"%}
200
{%trans "OK"%}
{%trans "request successful"%}
304
{%trans "Not Modified"%}
400
{%trans "Bad Request"%}
{%trans "request was invalid"%}
401
{%trans "Unauthorized"%}
{%trans "user does not have permission"%}
403
{%trans "Forbidden"%}
{%trans "request not authenticated"%}
429
{%trans "Too many requests"%}
{%trans "client is rate limited"%}
405
{%trans "Method Not Allowed"%}
{%trans "incorrect HTTP method providedForbidden"%}
415
{%trans "Unsupported Media Type"%}
{%trans "response is not valid JSON"%}

POSTثبت نظر سنجی☺

لورم ایپسوم متن ساختگی با تولید سادگی نامفهوم از صنعت چاپ و با استفاده X-Auth-User-Service-Key از طراحان گرافیک است. چاپگرها و متون بلکه روزنامه و مجله در ستون و سطرآنچنان که لازم است و برای شرایط فعلی تکنولوژی مورد نیاز و کاربردهای متنوع با هدف بهبود X-Auth-User-Service-Key ابزارهای کاربردی می باشد.


post/poll

{%trans "Rrequired Parameters"%}
شناسه /متغیر
توضیحات /اولویت
مثال
first_name
string
User's first name
اجباری
"John"
last_name
string
User's last name
اختیاری
"Appleseed"
telephone
int
User's telephone number
مشروط
"+98 123-123-1234"
{%trans "Example"%}

{%trans "Request"%}

    
  {
    "id": "[poll id]",
    "type" : "ask|random|null"
  }

{%trans "Header"%}

    
  GET / HTTP/1.1[CRLF]
  Host: sarshomar.com[CRLF]
  Connection: close[CRLF]
  User-Agent: Web-sniffer/1.1.0 (+http://web-sniffer.net/)[CRLF]
  Accept-Encoding: gzip[CRLF]
  Accept-Charset: ISO-8859-1,UTF-8;q=0.7,*;q=0.7[CRLF]
  Cache-Control: no-cache[CRLF]
  Accept-Language: de,en;q=0.7,en-us;q=0.3[CRLF]
  Referer: http://web-sniffer.net/[CRLF]

cURL

    
  curl -X PATCH "https://api.Sarshomar.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/settings/always_online" \
    -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
    -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --data '{"value":"on"}'

{%trans "Response"%}

    
  {
    "success": true,
    "errors": [],
    "messages": [],
    "result": "off"
  }
